content: >fashioned after a beach sighting on a hollywood actress this crochet cover-up style is great fun to crochet selecting any shade of coats creme de la creme it s breezy and delightful with a flattering drape that gives it feminine flair wear it over a shirt tee shirt dress or as a bathing suit cover-up it travels well so you can take it with you wherever you go yarnspirations **finished bust ** 46 54 60 117 137 152 5 cm **finished length ** 34½ 36½ 38½ 88 93 98 cm *fashioned after a beach cover up seen on a hollywood actress this style is great fun to crochet wear it over a shirt tee shirt dress or as a bathing suit cover-up red heart
